articles.author: Eddie Pells and Pat Graham
articles.title: U.S. sprinter Richardson tests positive for cannabis, could miss Olympics: sources - CTV News
articles.description: American champion Sha'Carri Richardson cannot run in the Olympic 100-metre race after testing positive for a chemical found in marijuana.
articles.content:
KINGSTON -- 
American champion Sha'Carri Richardson cannot run in the Olympic 100-metre race after testing positive for a chemical found in marijuana.
Richardson, who won the 100 at Olympic trials … [+2891 chars]
